arabic.title: أصعب حب
text: ان اللي انت وقعت في حبه

english.title: As3ab 7ob
text: when you find that the one you love doesn't love you
however your eyes speak, his heart doesn't feel you
you begin to give, he begins to snatch
suddenly you feel that the one you fell in love with
fell in love with, doesn't deserve you..ah doesn't deserve you
when your tears fall from you in front of his eyes and he doesn't see them
everytime you are about to say i love you, your heart shuts up not saying it
and because you are alone.. prisoner in this story
tayeh, magrou7, mosh 3aref..khayef mn ay nehaya
you begin to give, he begins to snatch
suddenly you feel that the one you fell in love with
fell in love with, doesn't deseve you..ah doesn't deserve you

english.title: Me
text: I am not a play in your hands
not a play in your hands
And I am not a worthless thing
I am not a play in your hands
not a play in your hands
And I am not a worthless thing
what a pity my love for you
what a pity my love for you
I will let you to the time
don't make me back to you , don't make me remeber
if you are let me I won't come back to you again
don't make me back to you , don't make me remeber
if you are let me I won't come back to you again
I was Patience like the Patience of Ayoub (he means Prophet Ayoub)
I  Patience for you my love
I don't know when ? and How?
don't make me back to you , don't make me remeber
if you are let me I won't come back to you again
Like who are before you , is unfairness
" The same like the words in the top"

english.title: This lady is my mother
text: and I'm the fruit of her patience
and I'm the fruit of her patience
I've lived in her grace all my life
I've lived in her grace all my life
and even if I live as her servant
I won't be able to repay her
and I'm the fruit of her patience
I was born to this lady
she was the first thing I've ever seen
the fist mirror I've looked into
this lady has worked hard and raised
and bore with the unfairness of life
on her chest, I always confided
on her lap, I will sleep in heaven

english.title: Ta3ala lia
text: come to me don't get away
come to me you're cruel and hard to get
my night got long,my states is one of its kind
my eyes didn't sleep one night
how many beautiful moments do we have in our lives?
we will live our days ,my darling,our way is long
you're my life's life ,you're my past and my memories
you're my tears and my smile,you're my start line and my ends
come back and have mercy to my sorrows
come to me don't get away
come to me you're cruel and hard to get
my night got long,my states is one of its kind

english.title: Come Say Goodbye
text: Ah if you just hear me
Baby i wish for you to come bake to me one day
don't than just come say goodbye
Do you remember me or you forgot me
You don't want me or you want me
i start to forget you baby
even if i forgot you is still with you
how could your heart become hard
how can i see you again

arabic.title: في ناس
text: في ناس بتحب تاخذ كل حاجه
في عز ما هي محتاجه وناس تدى وتنسى
ويلي يا ويلي آه ويلي ويلا ويلي
ياللي بتقولوا الزمن ده خد وهات
انتوا خليتوا الزمن ده كله هات
وناس تاخد وتنسى وناس تدي وتندم
في ناس بتحب تاخذ كل حاجه

english.title: there are people
text: there are people who love to take everything
even though they're not in need
and there are people who'd take anything
when they're in desperate need, and people who give and forget
and there are people who take and forget
and people who give and regret
even though they don't actually give
for those who say that this is the time of give and take
you've made it a time of 'take' only
when someone wants something from you
and when they drain the blood off your heart
they'll turn into a volcano of doom
and people who give and forget
and there are people who take and forget, and people who give and regret
even though they don't actually give
there are people who love to take everything
even though they're not in need
and there are people who'd take anything

arabic.title: فيها ان
text: حعمل ايه و لا ايه ولا ايه؟
لا لا لا لا مش هستنى
ده كده كده كده فيها ان
يا يقول لا يا يقول اه

english.title: there is a doubt
text: tell him no tell him no oh
if he doesn't speak if he doesn't greet if he comes and goes
so there is a doubt in it,yes there is a doubt
if there is something between us why is he silent about it
tell him no tell him no oh
if he doesn't speak if he doesn't greet if he comes and goes
so there is a doubt in it,yes there is a doubt
if there is something between us why is he silent about it
if i say something else to him what would it be?
so do i have to change my mind or what?
or do i go to any other world but his eyes
if he's meant to be with me ,maybe,what does he want?
i don't understand the issue ,what does he mean?
if his eyes doesn't care about my longing to him
i won't wait ,there is a boubt
di fi ha2i kebra law yeb3d wi astnah
what does love mean to him
if it comes to affection he doesn't say no or yes
i see him being nasty and he's eyes are longing
either we meet ,or he leaves me and i forget him
ya3ni ashouf li shoufa tanyia wala eih
a3ml eih wala eih wala eih\
a3mel eih wala eih wala eih
mish hastna da keda keda keda fi enna

english.title: Kan Alby Hases
text: my heart was expecting long time ago
that he doesn't have a place in your future life
my heart was expecting long time ago
that he doesn't have a place in your future life
i was lying to my self till i lost her
and i kept on getting closer to here i didn't get away that time
i was lying to my self till i lost her
and i kept on getting closer to here i didn't get away that time
i made my heart live in illusion and i belived her
while i was knowing the end and i saw it in my heart
that he was living the love
and that he was knowing the end was suffering
and that all his hope will be dashed

english.title: She Never Asks
text: She never asks how I'm doing
nor do my eyes ever see her
Time and time I've called for her and begged her
to be more tender, but never...
The moment her eyes looked my way
They betrayed her and told me [everything]
How come after making me happy,
she's now making my haters happy?
I cannot ever stand her absence
Nor can I love someone else ever
Time and time I've called for her and begged her
to be more tender, but never...
She never asks how I'm doing
nor do my eyes ever see her
Time and time I've called for her and begged her
to be more tender, but never...

arabic.title: مين فى الحياه
text: مين... فى الحياه دى ماتولدش برىء
وناس مضطره تمشى فى اى طريق
فى ناس بتدفع ثمن ذنب ناس تانيين
وخلاص مابقاش فى حاجه اسمها بنى أدمين
وناس مضطره تمشى فى اى طريق
مين... فى الحياه دى ماتولدش برىء

english.title: Mein fi alhayah
text: who, in this world, wasn't born innocent
there is no difference between us and the angels
may god forgive this world that changed us
there r people who were crushed in their way
and people who were lost in their ways
and people who have to go in any way
and the fault is at whom
there are people who pay for other people sins
as if the world is empty
and there is nothing called human beings

arabic.title: وحشتني
text: واحنا يا روح قلبى ما صدقنا
الله على لقا الحبيب بعد الغياب

english.title: I missed you
text: I missed you.. as much as sky stars
I missed you ..as much as love words
More and more..when we are together
Come.. lets us make the dream a reality .. come ..come
Come..lets us make up for every minute..come ..come
I'm afraid tomorrow will separate us
and we.. Oh, you my heart’s soul.. just can’t believe that
You missed me and you back to me and you told me “ I missed you “
Nights ..nights..nights ..you didn't leave my thoughts for one second ..nights. X2
Waiting for the joy and waiting for you ..and singing while I’m dreaming of meeting you. X2
God!..meeting the lover after the absence
Its sweetness bring back the youth to the love..God! God!
Come.. lets us make the dream a reality .. come ..come
Come..lets us make up for every minute..come ..come
I'm afraid tomorrow will separate us
and we.. Oh, you my heart’s soul.. just can’t believe that
You missed me and you back to me and you told me “ I missed you “

arabic.title: ولا مرة
text: و لا مرة تيجيني تسأل عني
و لا نظرة عين بيها تطمني
يا ليل يا ليل يا ليل
يا ليل يا ليل يا ليل
و لا مرة تيجيني تسأل عني
و لا نظرة عين بيها تطمني

english.title: Not even once
text: Not even once you come asking for me
Not even once you speak to me
Not even a longing word to make me patient !
Not even a eye contact (look ) blaming me
And the yearning of my eyes
و لا مرة تيجي تسأل عني

english.title: oh my night, oh my eye
text: oh my night, oh my eye oh  oh my eye, my night
the laugh of my love, the cruelness of my love
it`s not easy for me, my dear
the story of my life to be lost in love
i loved you, enough for me enough
my eyes love you my love so much
I love you with your hurt and I adore your look
I love you with your hurt and I adore your look
then I get away and forgive you then be blamed for love
oh my night, oh my eye oh  oh my eye, my night
the laugh of my love, the cruelness of my love
it`s not easy for me, my dear
the story of my life to be lost in love
my heart has surrendered up to you, my life
it didn`t  give you away or thought of losing you love at all
you left me and hurt me I forgive and forget
you left me and hurt me I forgive and forget
and you cut me and I love you, my love teacher

arabic.title: Leh Ya Donia (ليه يا دنيا الواحد)
text: بعد ده كله نعيب ع الدنيا

english.title: why, world
text: Why, world, does the human get close to the people who don't want him?
Why, world, is the human away from the people who want him?
Why do we always wrong? Why do we always cause pain?
Why do we treat cruelly, hurt and torture everyone gives us his love
Why do we sacrifice our souls for the one who doesn't want us, who mislead us
أول ما بنكبر بنهرب من ماضينا
أول ما بنقدر بندوس أقرب مالينا
بعد دا كله نعيب ع الدنيا واحنا العيب مالينا
We don't care about love, we don't get together in happiness
We search for what tires us out and what hurts us, and go for it
Our feelings r strong full of cruelty
Search for 1 in the 100 who is really loyal for u
Once u become great, many will love u
Once u become beautiful, many will hide ur defects
And once the time turns his back to u, all the people will leave u
We so called lovers, friends and relatives
,but the true feeling is always missed, and we've lost the love
There is no close hug, and there's no kind heart
The unjust is mixed with the kind, and it's the festival of god's creatures

english.title: why world? (world = destiny)
text: world ..why do we come closer to people who sold us?
world ..why do we go far from people who bought us?
why do we always injure ? why do we always pain?
why do we indurate , hurt torment who love us ?
why for who sold us , lost us , deceive & double-cross us ....we sacrifice ?
as far as we grow up..we run away from our past
as soon as we can ..we quash the closest to us
after all of that we blame the world ..& we are filled weth defects!
we do not care for love ..for happiness ..we are just looking for what is tire us & bain us !
our feelings are storng & filled with cruelty! ..just search for 1% that can be realyfaithful for you !
as we go higher..we have alot of admires..one we are beatiful ..alot hide our defects !
once the days sells us out..all people leave us
we call us friends & relatives..but feeling are lost ..we sold love
no one is close..no good hearts..the despotic is mixed with the honest
